attributes.title: WORST APP DO NOT GET
attributes.review: i originally downloaded this to get information on the upcoming rallies, but it kept glitching before i was even app to fully open the app. this makes me reconsider my vote- if i can’t have a president create a well-functioning app, how will i be able to trust him for the next 4 years running america???? DISGRACE!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I saw terrifying photos of an orange man and made my little cousin terrified to the point to where he is shaking!!! The app was then spamming notifications and when I clicked on when the app would crash. It was also sending viruses into my phone saying I was being tracked by federal agents that work with trump 😭

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Glitch right from the start. They wanted to track me by signing up with my phone number. Then there is a man with a picture with his fist up. Very threatening and looks like he just wants to hurt me, especially since I am a minority. Horrible app and would not recommend.

attributes.title: Don’t get it.. like stop...please
attributes.userName: hi lol the name is taken
attributes.review: This app is too disrespectful and it’s too inappropriate. I can’t let my kids see a orange man that’s too disrespectful just stop. Please don’t download it is really bad and I do not recommend it. My child went on this app thinking it was a game and now it’s affecting her physically and mentally.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: The app crashed at least 20 times trying to open it. When I tried to sign up it said my phone number was invalid. I closed out of the app and my phone started to glitch so I just deleted it and the glitching stop. Overall this is the worst app ever.

attributes.title: it’s a no from me✨🧚🏻‍♂️💕
attributes.review: all i have to say is that this app is the most horrendous thing i have ever laid my eyes on🤢pedophile trump, as we all know and love him, was portrayed disgustingly!! all the pictures were of this ugly and frankly putrid old man with unnaturally orange skin😤, flaky, crusty hair and just an out right nasty appearance😡i will be deleting immediately. i hate and despise this app and it definitely needs to be taken down before anymore people have their eyes burned from their brains. it is atrocious and awful and deserves nothing more than what is coming for it🥱periodt .

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: My pet dragon said that if i download the worst app in history, he’ll rescue a lesbian princess for me, so i did that. this app made my dragon DIE!! does anyone know how much my baby cost!! it was a lot of money. and he was my support dragon after seeing nude pictures of Donald Trump (more like Donald Rump) and NOW HE’S GONE!! don’t get this app. it will scar you for life

attributes.title: Disappointing :(
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking i was going to get updates on when Chester( the cheeto thing ) was going on tour with the One Direction, but quickly realized it was NOT that. This app needs to find a new campaign face, because i will not stand with someone using my Chester for something else. FALSE ADVERTISING!!

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: Got this app to see how Trump is doing. It’s so bad. It wouldn’t let me pass the home page without providing my phone number. As someone who doesn’t own a phone I was disgusted. I’m writing this review off of my Nintendo DS. I can’t fathom why anyone would download this app on purpose. I’m just. so confused. So awful.

attributes.title: A big OOF from me
attributes.review: Yeah this app was supposed to be my saving grace in the 2020 election. As a feeble woman I was unsure of my vote, and unfortunately do not have a husband to assign me my political party. As such I figured this app was a good idea. Needless to say I did not appreciate all of the soggy Cheeto pictures when I am clearly on an air only, vegan, non GMO, gluten free diet. Sad what AMERICA has come to. 😭💩🖕🏻🐖🥑
